Review Text: I had one of the best experience with them, the customer service was so top notch and I loved how clean the hotel was, and also the environment was so serene, I am definitely going back to this hotel!

The apartment is what it is meant to be however details need to be checked to ensure the experience doesn’t come up short.   The breakfast had one issue that could not be overlooked - the butter was kept on a plate of warm food and had melted by the time it got to the apartment. It should be kept separately in a small ice tray.   The DSTV service was also patchy.   Overall a space that can be lived in without much effort and is very comfortable  I enjoyed the fact that you felt cocooned within the apartment. Can even be used as a staycation.
Room Tips: The location sometimes has peak times traffic so plan your journeys to avoid peak hours.

Review Title: Great place to eat Especially at this time
Review Text: I have been working from home since March last year and shunned the possibility of any face to face business meeting or eating outdoor. However, I had one planned face to face that was a "must do". I had to search for a place I considered safe and where they played by the safety book. Seatle Residence met my bar of safety which is pretty high. I eventually had my custom made lunch(not on the menu list) at their restaurant and it was great!

First time in Lagos and this place has surpassed my expectations. The staff is excellently trained and attended to all of our needs. The unit was an absolute beauty, super clean and wonderful location. My most memorable part was the service as the spa. Looking forward to returning soon. Keep up the good work!

I stayed for a week in January and even during their soft opening phase, the service was great, friendly staff and the perfect place to kick off shoes after a hectic day. The spa is an excellent attraction as well. The home-away-home feel with its bespoke services makes it the perfect place for those who like the boutique concept. I will definitely go back again.

Review Title: Great experience - top notch flat right in the center of Lagos
Review Text: Stayed for a few days earlier this month (February 2019), I went with a couple of friends for a Nigerian friends wedding and we were all very impressed with the facility.  It's modeled after a hotel so offers you the same kind of service you'd get in a 4 or 5 star hotel.  According to my Nigerian friend (the bride) it's hands down better than a lot of the hotels in Lagos.  What makes it a stand out experience is that you aren't boxed in a room instead you have a spacious 3 bedroom flat.  Huge grounds, swimming pool and gym.  There was a restaurant and if you decide not to go down to eat you can order room service.  A small and cosy spa as well as business facilities which I needed for some unexpected printing for work.  The staff were extremely helpful recommending alternative
Room Tips: We saw the penthouse which is much grander than the 3 bedroom suite

Review Text: I stayed at the Seattle residences with a couple of friends and it was such a great experience. From the service to the comfort of the penthouse to the gorgeous views, we were so impressed with the accommodation. We had massages and the massage was by far the best massage I’ve had in the world. Not only did the therapists pay attention to my stress points, they also used different techniques during the massage. I highly recommend Seattle residences.

Salute the location, structure, ambience and staff. The trip was the highlight of my January break. Leaving felt like hardship, most certainly i am going to be back for some more. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to get away from reality

Seattle residences is hands down one of the most beautiful and well positioned residences in Lagos, along the five cowrie creek. Impeccable service, a pool, and in-house restaurant and spa - it is a home with the hotel experience.  I also had a massage and facial at the in house spa - best massage I have had in Lagos.

The views were amazing,environment was super  clean and the apartments were super comfortable and I felt like I was home.loved every part of it and loved the lounge with THE GOODLIFE.love it and cant wait to be back to Lagos.

This was the most luxurious experience I have ever had in Lagos. When I arrived, I found a well thought out welcome basket in my suite. The staff were very attentive and responded to my requests within short minutes. This best feature of this property is its privacy. My friends and I had a wonderful weekend without bumping into anyone. I will definitely be back

Review Title: Best Christmas Ever thanks to Seattle Residences
Review Text: Breathtaking view of the lagoon. Butler service on point. Large, clinical super clean well appointed rooms. Our 3 bed room made us feel Very much at home. Well mannered Staff, Port hole bathroom window gave me "Cruise ship Vibes" My kids did not want to leave after our stay at SR What an unforgettable December indeed

Thank you Seattle Residences! A great time! Exceptional service! Amazing customer service, right from the moment we checked in, our stay in the hotel and even when checking out. We had no complaints during our stay and every time we needed help, the staff members were quick to respond. A perfect Home Away from Home! Thank You Seattle Residences!

This place is beyond beautiful; from the decor to the views. The staff is always available to assist and you feel right at home. I'd recommend Seattle to anyone visiting Lagos , whether it be for business or pleasure.

Seattle Residences was a breath of fresh air amidst all the hustle and bustle of Lagos. I was welcomed and ushers into my stunning flat! My stay was flawless; the flat was tastefully decorated while overlooking the amazing views!  The staff were impeccable too!!   The building had an amazing cafe, a spa, a pool and a gym so I didn't need to leave often! The location of the apartment was very central which made getting around a breeze!    Thank you for an amazing stay !!

Seattle residences!  I don't know what brought about this name, but it's connected and this place is on a whole new level of comfort. I felt like staying permanently don't blame me...lol... The spa?  The pool?  The views?  Their services?  I totally recommend this experience. Try it out.

Review Title: Real luxury in a stunning setting...
Review Text: We often travel to Lagos to see family... this is a level above other accommodation we’ve come across.  Amazing finishes, excellent location, awesome views.... and we loved the spa treatments.  Looking forward to our next stay!

Excellent property. Magical view from all rooms. I loved the spa!! A must try in VI.Safe and quite neighbourhood. Rooms are spacious. Self catering kitchen is fully equiped kitchen with microwave, fridge, stove and washing machine.
